DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Improvement Erectile Dysfunction After Placement AMS IPP 2005 Inflatable Penile Prosthesis
DOC.detailed_description: Erectile dysfunction , inability attain sustain penile erection sufficient permit satisfactory sexual intercourse , affect estimate ten 30 million men United States . Erectile dysfunction cause many organic abnormality , include diabetes mellitus , hypertension , vascular disease , neurogenic disorder , chronic disease . Erectile dysfunction effectively treat variety method , include implantation inflatable penile prosthesis . A multi-center trial conduct assess AMS IPP 2002 Inflatable Penile Prosthesis include handle IPP implantation procedure short-term follow-up experience subject . The study collect pre-operative information compare pump operation use scrotal model current pump study pump , baseline erectile function history . Surgical data collect assess device design procedure enhancement . Patient physician assessment study device function , ease use , ease training/learning , adverse event gather post-operatively .

The subject previous penile prosthesis , willing able comply study protocol . No known sensitivity rifampin , minocycline tetracycline . Does systemic lupus erythematosus .
